page.title: 05PORTSMOUTH GOLF CENTRE
page.content: At the Portsmouth Golf Centre there are 4 professionals who teach golf. The qualifications needed are a 6 or less handicap and 5 years minimum learning.This sport used to be for the "well off"and "old",but now it's for everyone.More than 50,000 rounds of golf are played a year at this golf centre.There are more than 20,000 golf balls which the range owns,and over 100 people use them a day.Jumpers, clubs,golf bags and cheap golf balls sell the best.To start playing this sport it costs between Â£7 and Â£400.The lessons cost Â£4.20 for half an hour.The golf course covers a quarter of a kilometre of land,but the number of holes can vary from 9 to 18.
